Html: I was very  happy to find this code but it does miss many things and i was wondering if an update is planned.

Hi Nick,

At the moment I just wanted to provide an as-is version of the code for other similar projects to the one the keyboard was originally written for.

Which things do you think it is missing and would help you most of all with your particular situation?

I would hope that over the next several months I'll refactor the styling aspect of the control, but this is really a background task for me.

Feel free to contribute to the project by posting a patch if you'd like to help.

Kind Regards,
Mike
